module.name: IssabelPBX Framework
module.changelog: *2.11.0.49* Spoken/ASR support *2.11.0.48* Multi Park, ODBC functions, Supports for Asterisk 16 *2.11.0.47* Bump release for Aug 2018 iso and rebranding *2.11.0.46* Add default res_parking.conf used in asterisk 13 *2.11.0.45* Update release *2.11.0.44* GitHub release *2.11.0.43* Initial Issabel Foundation release
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
